tagline: See it before you paint it
seeBeforePaint: See paint colors on your walls before you buy
visualizeThisColor: Visualize This Color on Your Walls
downloadMuroToSee: Download Muro for iPhone and iPad to see {{colorName}} in your space using advanced AI technology

footer.tagline: Visualize paint colors on your walls with AI

questions.a: No, Muro requires a subscription. We offer weekly, monthly, and annual plans. Pick what works for you. Think of it as way cheaper than buying paint samples you'll never use.

Pretty accurate. We preserve your room's lighting, shadows, and details. Is it 100% perfect? No. Lighting changes throughout the day. But our users tell us the final result is very close to what they saw in the app.
30,000+ colors from Sherwin-Williams, Benjamin Moore, Behr, Farrow & Ball, Valspar, PPG, and lots of regional brands. We add new ones when people ask for them.

questions.q: Can I use colors from inspiration photos?
questions.a: Yep! Upload any photo from Pinterest, a magazine, wherever. We'll pull the color and find you the closest real paint match you can actually buy.
iPhone and iPad with iOS 16 or later. Works on both.

questions.q: How do I cancel my subscription?
questions.a: Go to iPhone Settings > Apple ID > Subscriptions > Muro. Cancel anytime. You keep access until your current period ends. No hidden fees.

questions.q: Where are my photos stored? Is my data secure?
questions.a: Your photos never leave your control. All images are stored locally on your device and synced to your personal iCloud account for backup. When you transform a wall color, your photo goes directly to the AI processor and back to your device—it never touches our servers. We cannot view, access, or store your images. Ever.
